billCode = #{billCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productCode = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productInsurance = #{productInsurance,jdbcType=INTEGER},
productDesc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productUnit = #{productUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productCount = #{productCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalPrice = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
customerName = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customerAddress = #{customerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customerTel = #{customerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dockPeople = #{dockPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
saleDock = #{saleDock,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payWay = #{payWay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
transactionNum = #{transactionNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
payNum = #{payNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
isFreeShip = #{isFreeShip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
myFreight = #{myFreight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seliverStatus = #{seliverStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update smbms_bill set billCode = #{billCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productCode = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productInsurance = #{productInsurance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, productDesc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productUnit = #{productUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productCount = #{productCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalPrice = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, customerName = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerAddress = #{customerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerTel = #{customerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dockPeople = #{dockPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, saleDock = #{saleDock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payWay = #{payWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transactionNum = #{transactionNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, payNum = #{payNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, isFreeShip = #{isFreeShip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, myFreight = #{myFreight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seliverStatus = #{seliverStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isPayment = #{isPayment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, waybill = #{waybill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seliverDate = #{seliverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creationDate = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyBy = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lejianBillId=#{lejianBillId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select b.* from smbms_bill b where b.id=#{id}

select b.* from smbms_bill b
and b.isPayment = #{isPayment}

SELECT a.`buyName`, SUM(a.`productCount`) AS 'buyCount' , SUM(a.`totalPrice`) AS 'buyTotal' FROM smbms_buy a
and a.`creationDate`>= str_to_date( #{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.`creationDate`<= str_to_date( #{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY a.`buyName`
HAVING a.`buyName`=#{buyName}

SELECT a.`productInsurance`, SUM(a.`productCount`) AS 'saleCount', SUM(a.`totalPrice`) AS 'saleTotal' FROM smbms_bill a
and a.`creationDate`>= str_to_date( #{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.`creationDate`<= str_to_date( #{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.`productInsurance`=#{productInsurance}
GROUP BY a.`productInsurance`

SELECT SUM(a.`productCount`) AS 'saleCount' , SUM(a.`totalPrice`) AS 'saleTotal', c.`userName` AS 'salePeople', a.`productInsurance` FROM smbms_bill a , smbms_user c where a.`createdBy`=c.`id`
and a.`creationDate`>= str_to_date( #{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.`creationDate`<= str_to_date( #{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.`productInsurance`=#{productInsurance}
and c.`userName` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{salePeople}),'%')
GROUP BY a.`createdBy` ORDER BY saleTotal DESC
